footer.title: GitHub
footer.body:
When building this project, my main goal was to ensure that the code was reusable and followed best practices. I wanted to create a framework that could easily be adapted and used in other projects. I believe that this is essential in web development as it saves time and effort while ensuring that projects are scalable.

The app is fully open source, and I encourage others to use and adapt any part of the code for their own projects. I believe that open source is the way forward in web development as it encourages collaboration and innovation.

Overall, I'm proud of the work that I've done on this project. It has been an excellent learning experience for me, and I believe that it showcases my skills as a web developer. While the app may not be perfect, I'm confident that it can be used as a starting point for other projects, and I'm excited to see where it goes from here.
